example.parse: (S (PP-TMP (in M-fiy M -فِي) (NP (the+conclusion MAlxitAmi M الخِتامِ))) (VP (distribute+he/it Mwaz~aEa M وَزَّعَ) (NP-SBJ (Murad/Mrad MmurAd M مُراد) (and Mwa- M وَ-) (Eitani M-EiytAniy~ M -عِيتانِيّ)) (NP-OBJ (the+armor/plate_armor MAld~uruwEa M الدُّرُوعَ) (the+memorial/commemorative MAlt~aXokAriy~apa M التَّذْكارِيَّةَ)) (PP-CLR (on/above MEalaY M عَلَى) (NP (families/indigenous_people MOahAliy M أَهالِي) (NP (the+martyrs MAl$~uhadALi M الشُّهَداءِ)))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to the families of the martyrs
